name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Inherit the Flame
storyline:
Welcome, a soul that is noble and pure. You have come to seek the past, but the foundation of truth has long been buried by time. This is the final escape from the doomsday and the destined tomb for the Flame-Chasers. What lies here only serves as somewhat amusing tales about the bygone past, about the thirteen people who never became heroes.

They lived so pridefully to the end. They sang the ode to civilization with their lives. This is the tale of those known as the Flame-Chasers. This is the unfinished journey of the Thirteen. But visitor, your path continues, no? Then you should follow your heart. Go along the footprints to witness their crusade. In the end, you will go beyond their destined tomb to create a future we could not reach.
summary:
Version 5.0 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Herrscher of Flamescion
• New ELF: Sirin
• New Gamemode: Elysian Realm
• ...and more!
